TopicTitle: Is there a mod that makes SAS and Gyros more realistic?

Articles.Content: Is there a mod that makes SAS and the gryos more realistic as in weaker, even torque saturation, such that you have to use RCS more?
A mod that makes it weaker is the Realism Overhaul, but that comes with lots of other changes which you may not want. Also, I don't know of anything that would add torque saturation.
